Description: Controls whether the product can be surfaced in ChatGPT search results.
Allows direct purchase inside ChatGPT. enable_search must be true in order for enable_checkout to be enabled for the product.

Validation Rules: Max 100 chars; must remain stable over time

Example: Waterproof trail shoe with cushioned sole…

Validation Rules: Must resolve with HTTP 200; HTTPS preferred

Requirement: Required if product condition differs from new
Required for all excluding movies/books/musical recording brands

Validation Rules: Multiple entries allowed; use colon separators

Example: Q: Is this waterproof? A: Yes

Supported Values: part_of_set, required_part, often_bought_with, substitute, different_brand, accessory

Validation Rules: Regions must be valid ISO 3166 codes

Description: Due to content truncation (8081 chars omitted from source), the following sections may be incomplete:
Possible missing fields between 'length' (line 18) and 'gender' (line 23) - may include additional dimension/size/variant fields
May be missing additional media-related fields
May be missing fields like installment pricing or loyalty points
Please review the complete specification at https://developers.openai.com/commerce/specs/feed to confirm all fields are captured
